fields.question: How can I enroll in a course?
fields.answer: You can enroll by creating an account and clicking on the 'Enroll Now' button on any course page.

fields.question: Can I get a refund after purchasing a course?
fields.answer: Yes, refunds are available within 7 days of purchase if less than 10% of the course has been completed.

fields.question: Do you provide certificates?
fields.answer: Yes, we provide completion certificates for all paid courses once you finish them.
